text.text_translated: We find evidence of early human civilisation in cave paintings that date from 100,000 to 50,000 years ago, but no one knows the connection between this art and language. The brain did not suddenly become larger, but humans became more complex and more intelligent. Did using language cause the brain to develop, or did a more complex brain start producing language?
